posts.post_content: For Sale (large reduction make an offer you never know!!) - A higher mid-grade T206 Sherry Magee Portrait P350 - SGC 4.5  $430 venmo no fee or $445 pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover state ST.
